snippet: Manchester United’s seven-point lead over its neighbor Manchester City stayed intact after a tough 2-1 win over Liverpool.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Manchester United’s seven-point lead over its neighbor Manchester City stays intact after a tough 2-1 win over Liverpool; City cruises to a 2-0 victory over Arsenal; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Manchester United’s seven-point lead over its neighbor Manchester City stayed intact after a tough 2-1 win over Liverpool.

headline.seo: Two Manchester Teams Prevail in Premier League
headline.main: Paths of United and City Lead to the Same Place
headline.print_headline: Paths of United and City Lead to the Same Place
